reloadTabsWarning.message: Whenever you change a setting, you have to reload the Twitch tab(s).

popupReminder.message: You can access these settings at any time by clicking on the extension icon

installThanks.message: Thank you for installing Twitch Adblock!

disableOtherAdblockers.message: In order to provide full functionality, please make sure that you disable any other Adblocker for Twitch.
